             How can we make accurate information more
            desirable?
            Why do we tend to prefer information that supports
            our existing beliefs?
            How can we limit the spread of misinformation and
            disinformation online? 
            
            
            I’m a PhD candidate at the University of Melbourne
            studying the contextual factors and characteristics of
            information that drive us to seek it.
            These are examples of the type of questions that guide my
            research interests. I combine experimental design from
            cognitive psychology with computational modelling to address
            these questions.
